thread.title: Fathima Azeer
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Fathima Azeer

author: Fathima Azeer
title: Fathima Azeer
text: Purchased two sofa sets from the Canton branch. Our salesperson Bob was friendly and supportive. The delivery guys were efficient too and took care to place the sofas where they had to be without damaging them as the doorway was not quite big enough.
